StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Age-Related Eye Disease Study 2 (AREDS2): A Multi-center, Randomized Trial of Lutein, Zeaxanthin, and Omega-3 Long-Chain Polyunsaturated Fatty Acids (Docosahexaenoic Acid [DHA] and Eicosapentaenoic Acid [EPA]) in Age-Related Macular Degeneration

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The AREDS2 study design is described in the publication, The Age-Related Eye Disease Study 2 (AREDS2): study design and baseline characteristics (AREDS2 report number 1). AREDS2 Research Group., Chew EY, Clemons T, SanGiovanni JP, Danis R, Domalpally A, McBee W, Sperduto R, Ferris FL. Ophthalmology. 2012 Nov;119(11):2282-9. Funding support for AREDS2 was provided by the National Eye Institute (N01-EY-5-0007). We would like to thank the AREDS2 participants and the AREDS2 Research Group for their valuable contribution to this research.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Eye Disease, IRB, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ED-IRB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Eye Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
